inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: performing glucose self-monitoring several times ( ≥ 4) a day

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: accepting to be treated with 100 U/mL rapid-acting insulin analog

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: total daily dose required must be less than 90 units (U)

exclusion.criterion: ability to understand and perform instructions
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: She doesn't smoke or use any drugs

exclusion.criterion: MRI, CT scan, or diathermy treatment
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: She likes to try diets and exercise to lose weight

notes: Patient is an obese woman with sleep apnea, PCO, and dissatisfaction with her body shape. She has a history of high blood pressure and heart rate.
